```{r}
library(tidyverse)
#create demographic variables
Stdt_Survey_ID <- c(1:89500)
School_Name <- sprintf("School %d",sample(1:895, 89500, replace=TRUE))
School_District_Code <- sample(1:500, 89500, replace=TRUE)
School_Geo <- sample(1:3, 89500, replace=TRUE)
Student_Last <- c(rep("Doe",89500))
Student_First <- c(rep("Jane",89500))
Student_Middle <- c(rep("Test",89500))
Stdt_Dis_ID <- sample(1:500, 89500, replace=TRUE)
Stdt_State_ID <- c(rep(29,89500))
Stdt_DOB_MM <- sample(1:12,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_DOB_DD <- sample(1:28,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_DOB_YYYY <- c(rep(2001,89500))
Stdt_EXIT_MM <- sample(1:12,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_EXIT_DD <- sample(1:28,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_EXIT_YYYY <- sample(2016:2020,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Primary_Dis <- sample(1:12,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Gender <- sample(1:3,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Race_Eth <- sample(1:7,89500,replace=TRUE)
Stdt_Exit_Status <-sample(1:4,89500,replace=TRUE)
Demographics <- data.frame(School_Name,School_District_Code,School_Geo,Student_Last,Student_First,Student_Middle,Stdt_Dis_ID,Stdt_State_ID,Stdt_Survey_ID,Stdt_DOB_MM,Stdt_DOB_DD,Stdt_DOB_YYYY,Stdt_EXIT_MM,Stdt_EXIT_DD,Stdt_EXIT_YYYY,Stdt_Primary_Dis,Stdt_Gender,Stdt_Race_Eth,Stdt_Exit_Status)
```
